bibl.title: Survey of the Via Hadriana: The 1998 Season
bibl.note: Third season of the University of Delaware's survey of the Via Hadriana, 1998-1999. - Part I: The Survey (S.E.S. and R.E.Z.). - Part II: Graffiti on the Via Hadriana (C.C.H.). - Part III: Significance of the Graffiti (S.E.S.), perhaps associated with a Christian tomb, first half of the VIth century. - Part IV: Conclusion (S.E.S. and R.E.Z.).
SIDEBOTHAM Steven E., Ronald E. ZITTERKOPF and C. Christina HELMS, Survey of the Via Hadriana: The 1998 Season.
JARCE 37 (2000) pp. 115-126, 1 tabl., 8 figg., 1 carte, 2 plans.
